paper_abstract: With the scaling of technology, the variability of timing performances of digital circuits is increasing. In this paper, we propose a first order analytical modeling of the standard deviations of basic CMOS cell timings. The proposed model is then used to define a statistical characterization protocol which is fully compliant with standard characterization flows. Validation of this protocol is given for a 90nm process.
paper_title: Statistical characterization of library timing performance
